title: Riot Tristana EUW

embed.description: "Wanna see the fireworks?" - Riot Girl Tristana

body: I really couldn't get my free Riot tris from the official page of lol, any help pls?

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble, she should be on your account now!
Hello, I couldn't get tristana either, keeps saying "Sorry, Riot Girl Tristana will be back shortly.", also can we still get unchained alistar?

You could submit a support ticket. I believe they have an automated system that should pick it up and help you pretty quickly, otherwise you might get a faster response through a ticket and get the skin added to your account. Who knows though, the poros could show up again at any time to help you.
